author: Unreal Engine
description:
Just starting your journey using Unreal Engine? This beginner tutorial series, created in partnership with Luke Anderton of Tinkr Studios, will show you how to get started while helping you start building your first 3d platforming game!

In this video, you will learn how to use the Material Editor to create a basic material that will make your coin glitter like gold.

YFHIU Tutorial Page: https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/unreal-engine/module-3-create-a-coin-pickup-with-modeling-tools-and-blueprints 
Additional Resources: 
Blueprint Visual Scripting: https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/unreal-engine/blueprints-visual-scripting-in-unreal-engine
Material Editor Guide: https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/unreal-engine/unreal-engine-material-editor-user-guide
title: Adding a Coin Material in Unreal Engine

author: Unreal Engine
description:
Unlock your potential in the Rigging in Unreal Engine Workshop! Learn practical, production-ready skills as you move toward hands-on mastery by building a complete animation-ready modular biped rig from the ground up. Get creative as you experiment with rigging systems, from procedural controls to deformers and physics.

Get started here: https://epic.gm/workshop-rigging-in-ue
title: Workshop Sizzle | Rigging in Unreal Engine

author: Unreal Engine
description:
PRO CAMERA ANIMATION HACKS (UE5): Learn advanced organizational techniques by dissecting Sub-sequences (nested Level Sequences), which isolate data like animation, lighting, and effects within each shot, offering superior artistic control. Optimize your workflow by setting up dual viewport layouts to efficiently animate dedicated camera control rigs and adjust visual elements, such as the intensity of camera shake via animation layers and the weight slider, all in real-time
►Download the A-COM Animation Sample here: https://epic.gm/agora-animation-sample
► Check out Sir Wade's channel for more Animation Tutorials and UE5 workflows: https://www.youtube.com/@SirWade/
► Sir Wade's Courses: https://courses.sirwade.com

#Animation, #ACOMAnimaticSample, #UnrealEngine5.6, #AgoraStudio
title: Advanced UE5 Cinematic Workflow: Camera Rigs & Custom Viewports
